ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.gnuplot

Class Scatterplot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.Plot
      • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.gnuplot.GnuPlot
        • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.gnuplot.Scatterplot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scatterplot, TwoDimensionalPlot

    public class Scatterplot
extends GnuPlot
implements Scatterplot
    Scatterplot with default settings. Given a table, this class will draw an x-y scatterplot with the first column as the values for the "x" axis, and every remaining column as a distinct data series plotted on the "y" axis.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

      • toGnuplot

        public String toGnuplot(Plot.ImageType term,
                        String lab_title,
                        boolean with_caption)
        Description copied from class: GnuPlot
        Generates a stand-alone Gnuplot file for this plot
        Specified by:
        toGnuplot in class GnuPlot
        Parameters:
        term - The terminal used to display the plot
        lab_title - The title of the lab. This is only used in the auto-generated comments in the file's header
        with_caption - Set to true to ignore the plot's caption when rendering
        Returns:
        The Gnuplot file contents
